about_the_game:
oceanScape is a relaxing sandbox casual simulation game. Ever wanted to effortlessly paint beautiful under water scenes where there are no mistakes and only happy accidents? OceanScape offers that with its built-in selection of corals, plants and creatures, all at your immediate disposal.

It’s easy, just click and paint, and the results are breathtaking. Design, scape, simulate and enjoy your own under water scene. Powered by the FlowScape engine, you can easily set up and enjoy the details of lifelike fish, crabs, plants and more. With photo realistic 3D effects, you can take a photo of the final scene.

OceanScape is a relaxing game to sit down for a few hours and let your creativity out by customizing every aspect of your underwater paradise
